title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.29 - Cleaning equipment and storage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-7.29 - Cleaning equipment and storage

State Regulations

Maintenance and cleaning tools such as brooms, mops, vacuum cleaners and similar equipment shall be maintained in good repair and
stored in a way that does not contaminate food, utensils, equipment or linens, and shall be stored in an orderly manner to facilitate the cleaning of that
storage location. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
